text: Fore-Caucasus (, sometimes Ciscaucasia, Front Caucasus) is a region to North of the Caucasus Major (Большой Кавказ) mountains of Caucasus and farther bounded by Kuma-Manych Depression from the North, Sea of Azov and the Kerch Strait from the West, and Caspian Sea from the East. Category:Regions of Russia
title: Fore-Caucasus
